labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix

issues.title: Start the specification
issues.author: baldawar
issues.body:
Complete the intial steps as suggested in https://github.com/timbray/quamina/issues/210. https://github.com/timbray/quamina/blob/main/PATTERNS.md as the base. Ideally we want to keep the spec in sync with [ruler](https://github.com/aws/event-ruler). 

All changes need to be made withinhttps://github.com/epml-spec/draft-ietf-patterns-protocol/edit/main/draft-ietf-patterns-protocol.md 

This has steps on how to get the build working https://github.com/martinthomson/i-d-template/blob/main/doc/SETUP.md

issues.title: Wildcard vs Shell-style
issues.author: baldawar
issues.body:
Quamina uses shell-style pattern https://github.com/timbray/quamina/blob/main/PATTERNS.md#shellstyle-pattern to match single wildcard characters. Event Ruler on the other hand went with the term `wildcard` and allows any number of them https://github.com/aws/event-ruler#wildcard-matching. 

Leave this issue open to discuss if 1/ do we have an issue here, 2/ if so, any need to converge in the spec, or 3/ allow spec to be lenient in how matchers are defined.

comments.author: timbray
comments.body: Quamina's shell-style is a stopgap because I hadn't figured out a good implementation for general-purpose wildcard. My intent is to be as compatible as possible with Ruler in the long-term.  So, /2

issues.title: Rename Repo To Match Naming Guidelines
issues.author: baldawar
issues.body: In the classic case of "should have read the docs first", as I started writing parts of the spec found out that our naming isn't conforming to the naming guidelines as shown in https://authors.ietf.org/en/naming-your-internet-draft. While I'll take care of the mentions within the markdown file; some parts of the doc get generated automatically based on the Repo Name / github-page link. So we would need to rename the pkg in future. I'd rather stay focused on https://github.com/epml-spec/draft-ietf-patterns-protocol/issues/1 at the moment, so I've created this issue is to ensure we don't loose track of this change later.

issues.title: Extended value patterns inventory
issues.author: jsmorph
issues.body:
Here's an initial attempt at an inventory of various "extended" pattern matching capabilities. Look about right?

| Extended pattern type     | Notes                            | Implementations |
| -----                     | -----                            | ----------      |
| string equality  |                                  | EB, ER, Q       |
| number equality  | Representation challenges        | EB, ER, Q       |
| Boolean equality |                                  | EB, ER, Q       |
| `anything-but`            |                                  | EB, ER, Q       |
| `exists`                  |                                  | EB, ER, Q       |
| `shellstyle`              |                                  | Q               |
| `prefix`                  |                                  | EB, ER, Q       |
| `suffix`                  | Via `shellstyle` in Q            | EB, ER          |
| `wildcard`                | Multiple `*` supported in EB, ER | EB, ER          |
| `cidr`                    |                                  | EB, ER          |
| "normal" `$or`            |                                  | EB, ER          |
| "parallel" `$or`          |                                  | EB, ER          |
| `numeric` inequalities    |                                  | EB, ER          |
| `numeric` equality        |                                  | EB, ER          |


I broke out some types (like `numeric` and implicit equals) perhaps unnecessarily.

# References

1. [EB: EventBridge docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eb-event-patterns.html#eb-create-pattern)
1. [Q: Quamina patterns](https://github.com/timbray/quamina/blob/main/PATTERNS.md)
1. [ER: Event Ruler](https://github.com/aws/event-ruler#readme)

comments.author: baldawar
comments.body:
Couple of comments
* Suffix via shell-style shouldn't count since there's already shell-style row. 
* EventBridge  doesn't support wildcards yet. 



Also, there are some additional reserved pattern names that can be included here as not supported by any https://github.com/aws/event-ruler/blob/main/src/main/software/amazon/event/ruler/Constants.java#L44.

pulls.title: Add abstract + intro for draft patterns protocol
pulls.author: baldawar
pulls.body: Following https://authors.ietf.org/en/required-content as guidance. Went the wrong way earlier this month, so start small this time and submitting PRs in pieces.
